<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: #OTK id_token Custom Claim"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Target Policy:  "OTK id_token Generation""/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Custom claims for id_token with name & value as JSON has be set in ${custom_claims}"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="== Sample JSON: { "claim1": "value1",  "claim2": "value2" }"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//Add custom claims as JSON"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:AssertionComment>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="custom_claims"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
